desc.p: Holds the fee calculation base amount for FEE.EFF.DATE
Holds the total fee amount calculated on the commitment unavailable amount using the rate from the corresponding FEE.PER.UVAL field
Records the negative movement of the FACILITY for the participant
Holds the percentage used to calculate the fee amount. This field is updated from the commitment fee percentage defined at the facility record
The effective date for the amount defined in the corresponding PART.TOT.AMT field
Holds the effective date of processing the fee amount .
Holds the total amount of the participant under this Facility
Holds the movement amount when there is a movement for the participant under the facility on a date defined at the corresponding field PART.AMT.EFF.DT
The date which is used as the starting date for the fee calculation
The tax amount calculated on the FEE.AMOUNT.UVAL is updated in this field
The date which is used as the end date for the fee calculation
Holds the outstanding balance of the participanT under the facility. This is effective from the date defined in the corresponding PART.AMT.EFF.DATE field
Key field which holds the FACILITY ID appended with the ID of the participant for whom the balance record is created
The tax amount calculated on the fee amount from the corresponding FEE.AMOUNT field
Holds the tranche code defined under the facility. This is a multivalue field associated with tranche level balances
Calculated fee amount for the participant under this facility record
Holds the commitment fee percentage to be calculated on the unavailable amount
Calculated fee amount for the participant under this facility record(UNAVAILABLE PORTION).
Records the positive movement of the FACILITY for the participant
Holds the total accrued amount on the unavailable commitment amount
Holds the outstanding balance of the participant under the tranche defined in TRANCHE.CODE field and effective on a date defined in the corresponding AMT.EFF.DATE field
Holds the outstanding balance of the participant under the tranche defined in TRANCHE.CODE field and effective on a date defined in the corresponding AMT.EFF.DATE field
Effective date for the amounts defined in the corresponding fields PART.OUTS.AMT and PART.AMT.MOVED
This field is updated with the total fee amount
Holds the total accrued amount on the commitment amount
Records the negative movement of the FACILITY for the participant under the Tranche
The effective date for the amounts defined in the corresponding fields TR.OUTS.AMT and AMT.MOVED
Records the positive movement of the FACILITY for the participant under the Tranche
Holds the movement amount when there is a movement in the facility for the participant on a date defined at the corresponding field AMT.EFF.DATE
